abilities.name: Final Sting
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may Knock Out Beedrill. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns. This power can't be used if Beedrill is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Super Slash
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is an Evolved Pokémon, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.
